__construct()

__construct(\Aura\Router\DefinitionFactory $definition_factory, \Aura\Router\RouteFactory $route_factory, array $attach)

Constructor.

Parameters

\Aura\Router\DefinitionFactory $definition_factory

A factory for creating definition objects.
\Aura\Router\RouteFactory $route_factory

A factory for creating route objects.
array $attach

A series of route definitions to be attached to the router.

Tags

None found

add()

add(string $name, string $path, array $spec) : void

Adds a single route definition to the stack.

Parameters

string $name

The route name for generate() lookups.
string $path

The route path.
array $spec

The rest of the route definition, with keys for params, values, etc.

Tags

None found

attach()

attach(string $path_prefix, array $spec) : void

Attaches several routes at once to a specific path prefix.

Parameters

string $path_prefix

The path that the routes should be attached to.
array $spec

An array of common route information, with an additional routes key to define the routes themselves.

Tags

None found

match()

match(string $path, array $server) : \Aura\Router\Route|false

Gets a route that matches a given path and other server conditions.

Parameters

string $path

The path to match against.
array $server

An array copy of $_SERVER.

Returns

\Aura\Router\Route|false —

Returns a Route object when it finds a match, or boolean false if there is no match.

Tags

None found

generate()

generate(string $name, array $data) : string|false

Looks up a route by name, and interpolates data into it to return a URI path.

Parameters

string $name

The route name to look up.
array $data

The data to interpolate into the URI; data keys map to param tokens in the path.

Returns

string|false —

A URI path string if the route name is found, or boolean false if not.

Tags

None found

setRoutes()

setRoutes(array $routes) : void

Reset the map to use an array of Route objects.

Parameters

array $routes

Use this array of route objects, likely generated from getRoutes().

Tags

None found

getRoutes()

getRoutes() : array

Get the array of Route objects in this map, likely for caching and re-setting via `setRoutes()`.

Returns

array

createNextRoute()

createNextRoute() : \Aura\Router\Route|false

Gets the next Route object in the stack, converting definitions to Route objects as needed.
